Package com.qualco.nationsapp.persistence

Interface DBConnection

All Known Implementing Classes:
DBConnectionImpl
public interface DBConnection
An interface that defines the operations that we want from the persistence layer of our application.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<BasicCountryEntry>
    getBasicCountryInfo(PaginatedQueryParams params)
    Return a List of BasicCountryEntry instances that answer task 1(a) of the instructions.
    List<String>
    getLanguagesOfCountry(String country)
    Return a List of Strings, one for each language spoken in the country provided (according to our data).
    List<MaxGDPPerCapitaEntry>
    getMaxGDPPerCapita(PaginatedQueryParams params)
    Answer task 2 of the instructions, returning the country name, country_code3 and max GDP per capita for all the years of observations that we have for all countries.
    List<StatsEntry>
    getStats(PaginatedQueryParams params)
    Answer task 3 of the instructions, returning the continent name, region name, country_name, year, population, gdp for all countries in our database.

  • Method Details

    • getBasicCountryInfo

      List<BasicCountryEntry> getBasicCountryInfo(PaginatedQueryParams params) throws DataAccessLayerException
      Return a List of BasicCountryEntry instances that answer task 1(a) of the instructions.
      Parameters:
      params - An instance of PaginatedQueryParams which encapsulates the sorting and pagination properties set by our query.
      Returns:
      A List of BasicCountryEntry instances, one per row that the underlying SELECT query returns.
      Throws:
      DataAccessLayerException - if an unrecoverable error occurs at the database level.

    • getLanguagesOfCountry

      List<String> getLanguagesOfCountry(String country) throws DataAccessLayerException
      Return a List of Strings, one for each language spoken in the country provided (according to our data). This answers task 1(b) of the instructions.
      Parameters:
      country - The country to search the spoken languages of.
      Returns:
      A List of Strings, each corresponding to a language spoken in the country provided.
      Throws:
      DataAccessLayerException - if an unrecoverable error occurs at the database level.

    • getMaxGDPPerCapita

      List<MaxGDPPerCapitaEntry> getMaxGDPPerCapita(PaginatedQueryParams params) throws DataAccessLayerException
      Answer task 2 of the instructions, returning the country name, country_code3 and max GDP per capita for all the years of observations that we have for all countries.
      Parameters:
      params - An instance of PaginatedQueryParams which encapsulates the sorting and pagination properties set by our query.
      Returns:
      A List of MaxGDPPerCapitaEntry instances, one per row returned by the underlying SELECT query.
      Throws:
      DataAccessLayerException - if an unrecoverable error occurs at the database level.

    • getStats

      List<StatsEntry> getStats(PaginatedQueryParams params) throws DataAccessLayerException
      Answer task 3 of the instructions, returning the continent name, region name, country_name, year, population, gdp for all countries in our database.
      Parameters:
      params - An instance of PaginatedQueryParams which encapsulates the sorting and pagination properties set by our query.
      Returns:
      Α List of StatsEntry instances, one per row returned by the underlying SELECT statement.
      Throws:
      DataAccessLayerException - if an unrecoverable error occurs at the database level.
